resources.string: Choose how you want to access HiveKey
Manage access, view logs, and control credentials
Access your digital passes and profile
Sign in to your secure account
Passionate about building secure, elegant mobile applications that make a difference.

HIVEKEY ‚Äî TERMS AND CONDITIONS OF USE

 Last Updated: February 2026

 By downloading, installing, or using the HiveKey application ("App"), you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions ("Terms"). Please read them carefully before using the App.


1. ACCEPTANCE OF TERMS
 By accessing or using HiveKey, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree, please discontinue use of the App immediately.


2. DESCRIPTION OF SERVICE
 HiveKey is a Secure Access Control Management System designed for organizations and enterprises. The App provides:
 ‚Ä¢ Digital pass issuance and management
 ‚Ä¢ Wi-Fi credential management
 ‚Ä¢ Access log monitoring and audit trails
 ‚Ä¢ Role-based access control (RBAC)
 ‚Ä¢ Identity verification through biometric capture
 ‚Ä¢ Cloud-based data storage via Cloudinary


3. USER ACCOUNTS AND REGISTRATION
 a) You must provide accurate, current, and complete information during registration.
 b) You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials.
 c) You must notify your administrator immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.
 d) Accounts are classified as either "Admin" or "User" with different access levels.


4. DATA COLLECTION AND PRIVACY
 a) The App collects and stores the following data:
 ‚Äî Full name and email address
 ‚Äî Profile photographs (selfies) for identity verification
 ‚Äî Access timestamps and authentication logs
 ‚Äî Device location data for security auditing
 b) Profile photographs are stored securely on Cloudinary's cloud infrastructure with industry-standard encryption.
 c) All passwords are hashed using SHA-256 encryption and are never stored in plaintext.
 d) Location data is used solely for security audit purposes and is not shared with third parties.


5. ACCEPTABLE USE POLICY
 You agree NOT to:
 a) Attempt to gain unauthorized access to admin panels or other user accounts.
 b) Reverse engineer, decompile, or disassemble any part of the App.
 c) Use the App for any unlawful or fraudulent purpose.
 d) Share your access credentials with unauthorized personnel.
 e) Tamper with or falsify identity verification data.


6. INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY
 All content, features, and functionality of HiveKey ‚Äî including but not limited to design, code, logos, and documentation ‚Äî are the exclusive property of the development team and are protected by applicable intellectual property laws.


7. DISCLAIMER OF WARRANTIES
 THE APP IS PROVIDED "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED. WE DO NOT GUARANTEE UNINTERRUPTED OR ERROR-FREE OPERATION OF THE APP.


8. LIMITATION OF LIABILITY
 IN NO EVENT SHALL THE DEVELOPERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES ARISING FROM THE USE OF THIS APP.


9. MODIFICATIONS TO TERMS
 We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. Continued use of the App after changes constitutes acceptance of the modified Terms.


10. GOVERNING LAW
 These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of India.


11. CONTACT
 For questions regarding these Terms, please contact the development team through the Developer Info section within the App.

 ¬© 2026 HiveKey. All rights reserved.
